channel.title: Need help really bad
channel.description: ok so the client i got will let me on and everything but then wont let other people on and the ip is set to my Ip address for the server. when someone els trys to get on what happens is that the client will say "Error Connecting to Server". if anyone can help me fix this that would have been cool i also got teamviwer if you will help me be hand on there.

item.title: Need help really bad
item.description:
@411 wrote:

Hmmm… im not sure why it wont let people connect to your server, you must have done something wrong. Heres a tutorial on how to start a server, it explains everything well. So just follow the tutorial to make sure you’ve done everything right.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Need help really bad
item.description:
@411 wrote:

Make sure the IP in the client isnt set to localhost, 127.0.0.1, because If thats the case, it will only let you connect, and not anyone else. If thats not the problem, then you need to make sure you’ve port forwarded correctly.

Read full topic
